# signout reprints

Two of our readings are printed pages. 
 
- The Doumont [-@Doumont2009] reprints are printed with permission of the publisher for our course this term only. 
- The Tufte [-@Tufte1997] pamphlets are my personal copies.

During class, please sign for one copy of each.  

Please return them per the calendar.
